Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Fielding Avenue
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and due to police activity near 79th/Fielding Avenue.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #147 Outer Drive Express Temporary Reroute at Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: #147 Outer Drive Express buses are temporarily rerouted due to severe weather conditions near Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer Drive Express buses are temporarily rerouted due to severe weather conditions near Lake Shore Drive.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan. Oak/Inner Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Diversey/Sheridan, Belmont/Inner Lake Shore Drive, Irving Park/Marine, Foster, then resume their normal route. 

Southbound buss will operate via Foster/Marine, Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore Drive, Belmont/Sheridan. Diversey/Cannon, Stockton, LaSalle, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Michigan/Oak, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 95th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 95th due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 95th due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
